1592950.name: Deadlokk
1592950.description:
You are part of a deep-space expedition to establish military supremacy to secure resources and technology by force.

  • Plan your journey and utilize the environment to benefit your fleet.

  • Crush enemies using superior technology found along your path.

  • Raid convoys, carriers and structures to strengthen your advantage.

  • Every class of ship has bonuses to different stats, along with their own specific abilities.

  • Exploit your ship's bonuses and abilities with equipment recovered from hostile ships.

  • Find your favorite build and adapt to any situation.

  • Recruit Co-Pilots to further your build with their powerful buffs and abilities.

  • Collaborate with your fleet to upgrade your carrier using your fleet's resource pool.

  • Protect your carrier at all costs!
1592950.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
